title: Tobacco cells and IAA, with 5 answer options 1

content.prompt: The optimum concentrations of hormones for promoting maximum tobacco cell growth are

choices.label: 27 mg/liter of IAA and 2.56 mg/liter of kinetin
27 mg/liter of IAA and 0.64 mg/liter of kinetin
4 mg/liter of IAA and 0.64 mg/liter of kinetin
1 mg/liter of IAA and 0.64 mg/liter of kinetin

skill.text: 4.B: Describe data from a table or graph, including: i. identifying specific data points ii. describing trends and patterns in the data iii. describing relationships between variables
